WRITING.TEXT: He's just a bit crispy.

WRITING.TITLE: I'm sorry
WRITING.TEXT: So I was playing a casual game with my friend (orks) and I rolled a perfect 18 shots for Foul Blightspawn and rolled ten strength aginst a squad of 10 nobz. My friend was a bit upset that I killed an entire squad of his nobz with one character.
Beautiful painting and great job on the base, My friend made a deffdread, except he added extra arms.

Yeah, I have relied my mistake, this was one of me and my friends first matches and we though attacks meant it could fire any weapon that amount of times. eg three attacks means I can shoot the gun three times, with three separate d6. So it was my stupidity that won that, but in that game he also killed a squad of plague marines by using a deff dreads Skorcha firing it twice in one turn and scoring 12 hits. so basically I need to learn the rules, and so do all my friends so this helped a lot, thank you.
OOF
